lines.text: Yes, but I don't think he heard me.
You love me, you just don't know it yet.
You know what I've been told? Italian men respect their wives. They spoil their mistresses. But the only women they love are their mothers.
Older people start aging backwards at some point.
I always play the hand I'm dealt.
It won't work. Take a look. He's ancient. He must be close to 40.
